name: Chimera (itch) (Yanko Oliveira)
description:
ARE YOU A BAD ENOUGH DUDE TO PROGRAM A GAME IN ONE CLASS?

Better experienced in full screen.

  • A/D, Arrows : Move paddle
  • Space: Interact
  • M: toggle audio

Made in one 879 lines class for #1classjam.  Maybe because of that, as you progress, there might be some.... glitches.

Source Code

Music by Leo Perantoni.
